entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 7.
